title: Hindsight
description: Final recovery of a core prototype module, where all season misfits align in hindsight.

scenes.narrative: The final prototype module is being moved to a secure facility. All previous anomalies begin to connect in unexpected ways.

choices.label: Coordinate with facility security for seamless transfer.
choices.consequence: Smooth coordination ensures the module reaches its destination safely.

choices.label: Verify all security protocols are in place.
choices.consequence: Protocol verification confirms the transfer is secure.

choices.label: Monitor the transfer with advanced tracking systems.
choices.consequence: Advanced monitoring detects and prevents any interference attempts.

choices.label: All the pieces fit now - prepared exits, skews, routes all converge.
choices.consequence: You see the full pattern: standardized exits, timing clusters, converging custody routes.

scenes.narrative: As the module is secured, the full scope of the season's events becomes clear. The case is closed, but questions remain.

choices.label: File the final report with all collected evidence.
choices.consequence: Comprehensive report documents the case closure and shadow implications.

choices.label: Analyze the complete pattern of anomalies.
choices.consequence: Pattern analysis confirms the shadow adversary's methods and motives.

choices.label: Secure all evidence for future investigation.
choices.consequence: Evidence preservation ensures future cases can reference these patterns.

choices.label: The network is dismantled, but the adversary slipped away again.
choices.consequence: Final reflection on the 5% that never sits right - the shadow endures.
